Text: In the beginning God created the heaven and the earth.
And the earth was without form
column5: and void; and darkness was upon the face of the deep. And the Spirit of God moved upon the face of the waters.
Let there be light: and there was light.
that it was good: and God divided the light from the darkness.

Text: And God called the light Day
column5: and the darkness he called Night. And the evening and the morning were the first day.

Text: The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want.
He maketh me to lie down in green pastures: he leadeth me beside the still waters.
He restoreth my soul: he leadeth me in the paths of righteousness for his name's sake.

column5: though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death
column6: I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me.

Text: Thou preparest a table before me in the presence of mine enemies: thou anointest my head with oil; my cup runneth over.
Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me all the days of my life: and I will dwell in the house of the LORD for ever.
For God so loved the world
column5: that he gave his only begotten Son
column6: that whosoever believeth in him should not perish

Text: For God sent not his Son into the world to condemn the world; but that the world through him might be saved.
